economi lincoln born poverti log cabin kentucki rais frontier primarili indiana self educ becam lawyer whig parti leader illinoi state legisl congressman illinoi return success law practic central illinoi anger kansa nebraska act open territori slaveri enter polit soon becam leader new republican parti reach nation audienc senat campaign debat stephen dougla lincoln ran presid sweep north gain victori pro slaveri element south view elect threat slaveri southern state began seced union time newli form confeder state america began seiz feder militari base south one month lincoln assum presid year ago gather wild grain begin least year ago nascent farmer began plant around year ago pig sheep goat cattl domest year ago plant independ cultiv least region world industri agricultur base larg scale monocultur twentieth centuri came domin agricultur output though billion peopl still depend subsist agricultur major agricultur product broadli group food fiber fuel raw materi rubber food class includ cereal grain veget fruit cook oil meat milk egg fungi one third world worker employ agricultur second servic sector although recent decad global trend decreas number agricultur worker continu aldou leonard huxley juli novemb english writer philosoph wrote nearli book novel non fiction work well wide rang essay narr poem born promin huxley famili graduat balliol colleg oxford undergradu degre english literatur earli career publish short stori poetri edit literari magazin oxford poetri go publish travel write satir screenplay spent latter part life unit state live lo angel death end
